alert.note: Alert for Garden (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:28PM CDT until August 08 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Garden County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 428 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, or 23 miles southeast of Alliance, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge, Miles Lake, Richardson Lake, Mumper, Dogtown Flats, Jerry Lake, Deer Lake, Britton Lake and Tralnor Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
